comparison.description: Determines how the armor value of the item should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: Determines how the armor value of the item should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value at which the armor value of the item will be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value at which the armor value of the item will be compared to.

type.description:
## Armor Value

---


[Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/armor_value)

Checks whether the item has a certain armor value. Non-armor items are considered as having an armor value of 0.

Type ID: `origins:armor_value`



---

### 📝 Note

You can visit these pages to get the armor values for each armor item piece:



    * [Helmet](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/armor_value)
    * [Chestplate](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/armor_value)
    * [Leggings](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/armor_value)
    * [Boots](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/armor_value)

---

### Examples

```json
"item_condition": {
    "type": "origins:armor_value",
    "comparison": ">",
    "compare_to": 3
}
```

This example will check if the armor item (in this context, a chestplate) has a higher armor value than 3, which is the armor value for the leather chestplate armor item.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Armor Value (Item Condition Type) date: 2021-04-05

Armor Value

Item Condition Type

Checks whether the item has a certain armor value. Non-armor items are considered as having an armor value of 0.

Type ID: origins:armor_value

!!! note

You can visit these pages to get the armor values for each armor item piece:

* [Helmet](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Helmet#Defense_points)
* [Chestplate](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Chestplate#Defense_points)
* [Leggings](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Leggings#Defense_points)
* [Boots](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Boots#Defense_points)

Fields

Field Type Default Description
comparison Comparison Determines how the armor value of the item should be compared to the specified value.
compare_to Integer The value at which the armor value of the item will be compared to.

Examples

"item_condition": {
    "type": "origins:armor_value",
    "comparison": ">",
    "compare_to": 3
}

This example will check if the armor item (in this context, a chestplate) has a higher armor value than 3, which is the armor value for the leather chestplate armor item.
